mapper.insert: insert into integrashopping (productName, productDescription, coverUrl) values (#{productName}, #{productDescription}, #{coverUrl})
mapper.update: update integrashopping set productName = #{productName}, productDescription = #{productDescription}, coverUrl = #{coverUrl}, where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, productName, productDescription, coverUrl from integrashopping
select id, productName, productDescription, coverUrl from integrashopping
